Republic of Pirates Unique Fleet Commander. Gains 1 charge to use the Raiding Party Action for every 2 [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Levels it has. Raiding Party: Targets an adjacent [icon:TREASURE_FLEET] Treasure Resource owned by a different Civilization in Distant Lands. This Settlement instantly spawns a [icon:UNIT_TREASURE_FLEET] Treasure Convoy under your control. This does not reset the turns until another [icon:UNIT_TREASURE_FLEET] Treasure Convoy spawns.
